title: Cycle TO Fun
description: This is a website that allows users to view a collection of Toronto cycling routes via a sleek and user-friendly interface.

title: Which City is Colder?
description: This is a game I created that blends geography trivia with an element of chance. It utilizes live weather data from Open-Meteo.

title: xkcd App
description: This app allows users to view famous webcomic xkcd. Fast loading times are achieved by preloading next/previous images.

title: Italian Bakery Online Store
description: I created an ecommerce website for a family-owned Italian bakery using the Shopify platform, including its third-party app ecosystem.

title: Bike Share Toronto Rides Analysis
description: I analyzed Bike Share Toronto data to find that riders tended to lose elevation (i.e. bike downhill more often than uphill) in 2022.

title: U.S. National Parks Visits Analysis
description: In this simple data aggregation and visualization project, I show that more people will visit U.S. national parks when the weather is warm.
